title: Gauge Theory and Skein Modules
summary: We study skein modules of 3-manifolds by embedding them into the Hilbert spaces of 4d ${\cal N}=4$ super-Yang-Mills theories. When the 3-manifold has reduced holonomy, we present an algorithm to determine the dimension and the list of generators of the skein module with a general gauge group. The analysis uses a deformation preserving ${\cal N}=1$ supersymmetry to express the dimension as a sum over nilpotent orbits. We find that the dimensions often differ between Langlands-dual pairs beyond the A-series, for which we provide a physical explanation involving chiral symmetry breaking and 't Hooft operators. We also relate our results to the structure of $\mathbb{C}^*$-fixed loci in the moduli space of Higgs bundles. This approach helps to clarify the relation between the gauge-theoretic framework of Kapustin and Witten with other versions of the geometric Langlands program, explains why the dimensions of skein modules do not exhibit a TQFT-like behavior, and provides a physical interpretation of the skein-valued curve counting of Ekholm and Shende.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过将3-流形的skein模嵌入4d超对称杨-米尔斯理论的希尔伯特空间，提出了一种计算skein模维度和生成元的算法，并揭示了朗兰兹对偶群之间的维度差异及其物理机制。
AI.motivation: 研究动机是建立3-流形skein模与4d超对称规范理论之间的联系，理解skein模的维度特性，特别是朗兰兹对偶群之间的维度差异，并澄清Kapustin-Witten规范理论框架与其他几何朗兰兹版本的关系。
AI.method: 方法是将3-流形的skein模嵌入4d N=4超对称杨-米尔斯理论的希尔伯特空间。当3-流形具有约化完整群时，使用保持N=1超对称性的变形，将维度表示为幂零轨道的和。通过分析手征对称性破缺和't Hooft算符来解释朗兰兹对偶群间的维度差异。
AI.result: 研究结果包括：1）提出了确定一般规范群下skein模维度和生成元的算法；2）发现A系列之外的朗兰兹对偶群对的skein模维度经常不同；3）提供了涉及手征对称性破缺和't Hooft算符的物理解释；4）将结果与希格斯丛模空间的C*固定轨迹结构联系起来。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过规范理论方法阐明了skein模的维度特性，解释了为什么skein模维度不表现出TQFT-like行为，为Ekholm和Shende的skein值曲线计数提供了物理解释，并帮助澄清了Kapustin-Witten规范理论框架与其他几何朗兰兹版本之间的关系。

title: On mode transition algebras for $\mathbb{Z}$-graded vertex algebras and applications to bosonic ghosts
summary: We study the mode transition algebras and Zhu algebras in the setting of $\mathbb{Z}$-graded vertex algebras, with particular focus on the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 (also known as bosonic ghosts or the $βγ$-system). We show that the mode transition algebras of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 admit unity elements that form a family of strong unities in the sense of Damiolini-Gibney-Krashen. The existence of unities for the mode transition algebra of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 allows us to explicitly construct all higher level Zhu algebras of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2. We further analyze weak modules of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 induced from Zhu algebras, proving that every such module is already induced from the level-zero Zhu algebra. We then prove that all indecomposable reducible weight modules induced from a Zhu algebra are not weakly interlocked, and hence not strongly interlocked in the sense of Barron-Batistelli-Orosz Hunziker-Yamskulna. More generally, we show that the property of being weakly interlocked is preserved under the action of an invertible Li's $\mathbfΔ$ operator. As an application, we prove that all indecomposable reducible weight modules of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 obtained via spectral flow of Zhu-induced modules are likewise not weakly interlocked. These results clarify the role of being weakly interlocked in the modularity properties of bosonic ghost modules previously studied by Ridout-Wood and Allen-Wood.

AI.tldr: 研究了中心荷为2的Weyl顶点代数的模过渡代数和Zhu代数，证明了模过渡代数存在强单位元，并构造了所有高阶Zhu代数。分析了从Zhu代数诱导的弱模，证明了所有此类模都从零级Zhu代数诱导，且所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的。
AI.motivation: 研究Weyl顶点代数（中心荷为2的玻色子鬼场或βγ系统）的模过渡代数和Zhu代数结构，特别是探索这些代数中单位元的存在性及其对模构造的影响，澄清弱互锁性质在玻色子鬼场模的模性性质中的作用。
AI.method: 在ℤ-分次顶点代数框架下研究Weyl顶点代数，证明其模过渡代数存在形成Damiolini-Gibney-Krashen意义下强单位元族的单位元。利用这些单位元显式构造所有高阶Zhu代数，分析从Zhu代数诱导的弱模结构，研究弱互锁性质在可逆Li Δ算子作用下的保持性。
AI.result: 证明了Weyl顶点代数（中心荷为2）的模过渡代数存在强单位元族，由此显式构造了所有高阶Zhu代数。证明了所有从Zhu代数诱导的弱模都从零级Zhu代数诱导，所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的，弱互锁性质在可逆Li Δ算子作用下保持不变。
AI.conclusion: Weyl顶点代数（中心荷为2）的模过渡代数具有丰富的单位元结构，这为构造高阶Zhu代数提供了基础。从Zhu代数诱导的模具有特定的结构性质，特别是所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的，这澄清了弱互锁性质在玻色子鬼场模模性性质中的作用。

title: Generalized Symmetries From Fusion Actions
comment: minor revision of the previous version; Prop. 3.10 and some references are added; some typos are corrected; Latex 44 pages
summary: Let $A$ be a condensable algebra in a modular tensor category $\mathcal{C}$. We define an action of the fusion category $\mathcal{C}_A$ of $A$-modules in $\mathcal{C}$ on the morphism space $\mbox{Hom}_{\mathcal{C}}(x,A)$ for any $x$ in $\mathcal{C}$, whose characters are generalized Frobenius-Schur indicators. This fusion action can be considered on $A$, and we prove a categorical generalization of the Schur-Weyl duality for this action. For any fusion subcategory $\mathcal{B}$ of $\mathcal{C}_A$ containing all the local $A$-modules, we prove the invariant subobject $B=A^\mathcal{B}$ is a condensable subalgebra of $A$. The assignment of $\mathcal{B}$ to $A^\mathcal{B}$ defines a Galois correspondence between this kind of fusion subcategories of $\mathcal{C}_A$ and the condensable subalgebras of $A$. In the context of VOAs, we prove for any nice VOAs $U \subset A$, $U=A^{\mathcal{C}_A}$ where $\mathcal{C}=\mathcal{M}_U$ is the category of $U$-modules. In particular, if $U = A^G$ for some finite automorphism group $G$ of $A,$ the fusion action of $\mathcal{C}_A$ on $A$ is equivalent to the $G$-action on $A.$

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了模张量范畴中可凝聚代数A的融合范畴作用，建立了广义Frobenius-Schur指标与Schur-Weyl对偶的范畴化版本，并证明了融合子范畴与可凝聚子代数之间的Galois对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究模张量范畴中可凝聚代数的结构性质，探索融合范畴在态射空间上的作用，建立范畴化的Schur-Weyl对偶理论，并建立融合子范畴与可凝聚子代数之间的对应关系。
AI.method: 定义融合范畴C_A在态射空间Hom_C(x,A)上的作用，其特征为广义Frobenius-Schur指标。证明该作用在A上的范畴化Schur-Weyl对偶。对于包含所有局部A-模的融合子范畴B，证明不变子对象B=A^B是A的可凝聚子代数。
AI.result: 建立了融合子范畴B到可凝聚子代数A^B的Galois对应关系。在顶点算子代数(VOA)背景下，证明了对于任意好的VOA包含关系U⊂A，有U=A^{C_A}，其中C=M_U是U-模范畴。特别地，当U=A^G时，C_A在A上的融合作用等价于G在A上的作用。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为模张量范畴中可凝聚代数的结构提供了系统的理论框架，建立了融合范畴作用与代数结构之间的深刻联系，推广了经典的Schur-Weyl对偶，并在顶点算子代数理论中得到了具体应用。

title: $N=1$ super Virasoro tensor categories
comment: Minor revisions for clarity and references updated. Final version, to appear in Communications in Mathematical Physics
summary:
We show that the category of $C_1$-cofinite modules for the universal $N=1$ super Virasoro vertex operator superalgebra $\mathcal{S}(c,0)$ at any central charge $c$ is locally finite and admits the vertex algebraic braided tensor category structure of Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang. For central charges $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)=\frac{15}{2}-3(t+t^{-1})$ with $t\notin\mathbb{Q}$, we show that this tensor category is semisimple, rigid, and slightly degenerate, and we determine its fusion rules. For central charge $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(1)=\frac{3}{2}$, we show that this tensor category is rigid and that its simple modules have the same fusion rules as $\mathrm{Rep}\,\mathfrak{osp}(1\vert 2)$, in agreement with earlier fusion rule calculations of Milas. Finally, for the remaining central charges $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)$ with $t\in \mathbb{Q}^\times$, we show that the simple $\mathcal{S}(c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t),0)$-module $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ of lowest conformal weight $h^{\mathfrak{ns}}_{2,2}(t)=\frac{3(t-1)^2}{8t}$ is rigid and self-dual, except possibly when $t^{\pm 1}$ is a negative integer or when $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)$ is the central charge of a rational $N=1$ superconformal minimal model.
  As $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ is expected to generate the category of $C_1$-cofinite $\mathcal{S}(c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t),0)$-modules under fusion, rigidity of $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ is the first key step to proving rigidity of this category for general $t\in\mathbb{Q}^\times$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数在任意中心荷下的C1-余有限模范畴，证明了其局部有限性并建立了张量范畴结构。针对不同中心荷参数，分析了范畴的刚性、半单性、退化性及融合规则。
AI.motivation: 研究N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数的C1-余有限模范畴的张量范畴结构，特别是其刚性、半单性和融合规则，以深化对超共形场论代数结构的理解。
AI.method: 使用Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang的顶点代数辫化张量范畴理论框架，分析不同中心荷参数下C1-余有限模范畴的性质。针对有理和无理参数分别处理，研究简单模的刚性、自对偶性及融合规则。
AI.result:
1. 对所有中心荷c，C1-余有限模范畴都是局部有限的，并具有Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang张量范畴结构。
2. 对无理参数t，范畴是半单、刚性且轻微退化的，并确定了其融合规则。
3. 对c=3/2的特殊情况，范畴是刚性的，其简单模的融合规则与Rep 𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)相同。
4. 对有理参数t，证明了简单模𝒮_{2,2}的刚性和自对偶性（除少数特殊情况外）。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统建立了N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数C1-余有限模范畴的张量范畴理论，为理解超共形场论的代数结构提供了重要基础。𝒮_{2,2}模的刚性是证明有理参数t下整个范畴刚性的关键第一步。

title: Recursion relations and BPS-expansions in the HOMFLY-PT skein of the solid torus
comment: v2: minor corrections. Accepted for publication in Quantum Topology
summary: Inspired by the skein valued open Gromov-Witten theory of Ekholm and Shende and the Gopakumar-Vafa formula, we associate to each pair of non-negative integers $(g,l)$ a formal power series with values in the HOMFLY-PT skein of a disjoint union of $l$ solid tori. The formal power series can be thought of as open BPS-states of genus $g$ with $l$ boundary components and reduces to the contribution of a single BPS state of genus $g$ for $l=0$. Using skein theoretic methods we show that the formal power series satisfy gluing identities and multi-cover skein relations corresponding to an elliptic boundary node of the underlying curves. For $(g,l)=(0,1)$ we prove a crossing formula which is the multi-cover skein relation corresponding to a hyperbolic boundary node, also known as the pentagon identity.

AI.tldr: 该论文基于Ekholm和Shende的扭结值开Gromov-Witten理论以及Gopakumar-Vafa公式，为每对非负整数(g,l)构造了一个取值于l个实心环面不交并的HOMFLY-PT扭结中的形式幂级数，可视为具有l个边界分量的开BPS态。
AI.motivation: 受到开Gromov-Witten理论和Gopakumar-Vafa公式的启发，旨在建立开BPS态与扭结理论之间的联系，为拓扑弦理论中的开弦不变量的研究提供新的数学框架。
AI.method: 使用扭结理论方法，为每对(g,l)构造形式幂级数，证明这些级数满足粘合恒等式和对应于椭圆边界节点的多重覆盖扭结关系，特别对(0,1)情况证明了对应于双曲边界节点的交叉公式（五边形恒等式）。
AI.result: 成功构造了开BPS态的形式幂级数表示，证明了这些级数满足重要的拓扑恒等式，包括粘合恒等式、椭圆边界节点的多重覆盖关系，以及(0,1)情况下的五边形恒等式（双曲边界节点的交叉公式）。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了开BPS态与扭结理论之间的系统联系，为理解拓扑弦理论中的开弦不变量提供了新的数学工具，所证明的恒等式为进一步研究开Gromov-Witten理论奠定了基础。

title: Hopf 2-algebras and Braided Monoidal 2-Categories
comment: 89 pages (v4: final version accepted to TAC)
summary: Following the theory of principal $\infty$-bundles of Niklaus-Schreiber-Steveson, we develop a homotopy categorification of Hopf algebras, which model quantum groups. We study their higher-representation theory in the setting of $\mathsf{2Vect}^{hBC}$, which is a homotopy refinement of the notion of 2-vector spaces due to Baez-Crans that allows for higher coherence data. We construct in particular the 2-quantum double as a homotopy double crossed product, and prove its duality and factorization properties. We also define and characterize "2-$R$-matrices", which can be seen as an extension of the usual notion of $R$-matrix in an ordinary Hopf algebra. We found that the 2-Yang-Baxter equations describe the braiding of extended defects in 4d, distinct from but not unlike the Zamolodchikov tetrahedron equations. The main results we prove in this paper is that the 2-representation 2-category of a weak 2-bialgebra is braided monoidal if it is equipped with a universal 2-$R$-matrix, and that our homotopy quantization admits the theory of Lie 2-bialgebras as a semiclassical limit.

AI.tldr: 本文基于主∞-丛理论，发展了量子群模型的同伦范畴化Hopf代数，研究其在2Vect^{hBC}中的高阶表示理论，构造了2-量子双作为同伦双交叉积，并证明了其对偶性和分解性质。
AI.motivation: 将Hopf代数和量子群理论推广到高阶范畴化框架，建立同伦精炼的2-向量空间理论，以研究4维扩展缺陷的编织结构，连接经典Yang-Baxter方程与Zamolodchikov四面体方程。
AI.method: 基于Niklaus-Schreiber-Steveson的主∞-丛理论，在Baez-Crans的2-向量空间概念上进行同伦精炼，构建弱2-双代数、2-量子双（作为同伦双交叉积）、2-R-矩阵，并研究2-Yang-Baxter方程。
AI.result: 证明了当配备通用2-R-矩阵时，弱2-双代数的2-表示2-范畴是辫子幺半范畴；同伦量子化以Lie 2-双代数理论作为半经典极限；2-Yang-Baxter方程描述了4维扩展缺陷的编织结构。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了Hopf代数的同伦范畴化理论框架，将量子群表示论推广到高阶范畴，为研究高维拓扑量子场论和扩展缺陷提供了新的数学工具，连接了经典量子群理论与高阶代数结构。

title: On rationality for $C_2$-cofinite vertex operator algebras
comment: 78 pages, final version to appear in Cambridge Journal of Mathematics, some major changes from previous version: Appendix A from previous version and proofs of some results already in the literature have been removed for brevity; Section 3.1 from previous version has been moved and combined with material from Section 5.2 to form new Section 5.3; new Section 1.1 on previous work has been added
summary: Let $V$ be an $\mathbb{N}$-graded, simple, self-contragredient, $C_2$-cofinite vertex operator algebra. We show that if the $S$-transformation of the character of $V$ is a linear combination of characters of $V$-modules, then the category $\mathcal{C}$ of grading-restricted generalized $V$-modules is a rigid tensor category. We further show, without any assumption on the character of $V$ but assuming that $\mathcal{C}$ is rigid, that $\mathcal{C}$ is a factorizable finite ribbon category, that is, a not-necessarily-semisimple modular tensor category. As a consequence, we show that if the Zhu algebra of $V$ is semisimple, then $\mathcal{C}$ is semisimple and thus $V$ is rational. The proofs of these theorems use techniques and results from tensor categories together with the method of Moore-Seiberg and Huang for deriving identities of two-point genus-one correlation functions associated to $V$. We give two main applications. First, we prove the conjecture of Kac-Wakimoto and Arakawa that $C_2$-cofinite affine $W$-algebras obtained via quantum Drinfeld-Sokolov reduction of admissible-level affine vertex algebras are strongly rational. The proof uses the recent result of Arakawa and van Ekeren that such $W$-algebras have semisimple (Ramond twisted) Zhu algebras. Second, we use our rigidity results to reduce the "coset rationality problem" to the problem of $C_2$-cofiniteness for the coset. That is, given a vertex operator algebra inclusion $U\otimes V\hookrightarrow A$ with $A$, $U$ strongly rational and $U$, $V$ a pair of mutual commutant subalgebras in $A$, we show that $V$ is also strongly rational provided it is $C_2$-cofinite.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在特定条件下，顶点算子代数的分级限制广义模范畴是刚性张量范畴，甚至是模张量范畴，并应用于W-代数的强有理性和余集合理性问题的简化。
AI.motivation: 研究顶点算子代数模范畴的刚性结构，特别是要建立C2-余有限顶点算子代数的模范畴的刚性、可分解性和模性，从而解决W-代数的强有理性和余集合理性等长期悬而未决的问题。
AI.method: 结合张量范畴理论的技术与结果，以及Moore-Seiberg和Huang推导两点亏格为一相关函数恒等式的方法，分析顶点算子代数模范畴的结构性质。
AI.result: 证明了在S-变换条件下模范畴是刚性张量范畴；在刚性条件下模范畴是可分解有限带范畴（即模张量范畴）；当朱代数是半单时，模范畴是半单的，从而顶点算子代数是有理的。
AI.conclusion: 这些结果为顶点算子代数模范畴的结构提供了深刻理解，并成功应用于证明Kac-Wakimoto和Arakawa关于W-代数强有理性的猜想，以及简化余集合理性问题的条件。

title: Unbounded field operators in categorical extensions of conformal nets
comment: 65 pages. Final revision. Significant renumbering of sections, theorems, and equations to match the published version. Published in Invent. Math
summary: We prove the equivalence of VOA tensor categories and conformal net tensor categories for the following examples: all WZW models; all lattice VOAs; all unitary parafermion VOAs; type $ADE$ discrete series $W$-algebras; their tensor products; their regular cosets. A new proof of the complete rationality of conformal nets is also given.

AI.tldr: 证明了VOA张量范畴与共形网张量范畴在多种重要模型中的等价性，包括WZW模型、格点VOA、酉parafermion VOA、ADE离散系列W-代数及其张量积和正则陪集，并给出了共形网完全有理性的新证明。
AI.motivation: 在共形场论中，顶点算子代数（VOA）和共形网是两种不同的数学框架，但都描述相同的物理系统。研究这两种框架中张量范畴的等价性对于建立数学物理的统一理论至关重要，有助于理解不同数学表述之间的内在联系。
AI.method: 通过系统性地分析多种重要模型类别，包括WZW模型、格点VOA、酉parafermion VOA、ADE离散系列W-代数，以及它们的张量积和正则陪集，证明了在这些具体例子中VOA张量范畴与共形网张量范畴的等价性。
AI.result: 成功证明了在所述所有模型类别中，VOA张量范畴与共形网张量范畴确实是等价的。同时提供了共形网完全有理性的新证明，这为相关数学结构的研究提供了新的视角和方法。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了VOA和共形网这两种重要数学框架在张量范畴层面的深刻联系，为共形场论的数学基础提供了重要支撑，同时新的证明方法也为该领域的进一步发展开辟了新的可能性。
